title: Children's circle
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: A quality series that brings outstanding children's books to the screen. The stories bring alive the actual illustrations from the book, through animation and iconographic techniques. Honoured by awards at Film Festivals worldwide, these programs are the perfect bridge between video and reading.
